name: css-caption-side
description: Css module of single purpose classes for caption side

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-caption-side.css > css/css-caption-side.css && tachyons src/css-caption-side.css --minify > css/css-caption-side.min.css && tachyons src/css-caption-side.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
